trans-unit.source: Set Up Payment Methods| Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Set Up Payment Methods| Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: Payment methods define how an invoice will be paid.

seg-source.mrk: Payment methods define how an invoice will be paid.

target.mrk: Platební metody definují, jak bude faktura zaplacena.

trans-unit.source: You can set up any number of payment methods.

seg-source.mrk: You can set up any number of payment methods.

target.mrk: Můžete nastavit jakýkoli počet platebních metod.

trans-unit.source: Examples of payment methods can be BANK, CASH, CHECK, or ACCOUNT.

seg-source.mrk: Examples of payment methods can be BANK, CASH, CHECK, or ACCOUNT.

target.mrk: Příklady platebních metod můžou být BANKA, HOTOVOST, ŠEK, nebo ÚČET.

trans-unit.source: Payment methods are linked to vendors in order to specify how an invoice from the specific vendor must be paid.

seg-source.mrk: Payment methods are linked to vendors in order to specify how an invoice from the specific vendor must be paid.

target.mrk: Platební metody jsou spojeny s dodavateli tak, aby specifikovali, jak má být faktura od specifického dodavatele zaplacena.

trans-unit.source: To set up a payment methods

seg-source.mrk: To set up a payment methods

trans-unit.source: Several typical payment methods are already defined in [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

seg-source.mrk: Several typical payment methods are already defined in [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

target.mrk: Několik typických platebních metod je definováno v [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: You can define new payment methods in the **Payment Methods** window, which you can find with the search function or open from the **Payment Method** field on an a vendor or customer card.

seg-source.mrk: You can define new payment methods in the **Payment Methods** window, which you can find with the search function or open from the **Payment Method** field on an a vendor or customer card.

target.mrk: Nové platební metody můžete definovat v okně **Platební metody**, které můžete najít pomocí vyhledávací funkce nebo otevřít z pole **Platební metoda** u karty dodavatele nebo zákazníka.

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Search for Page or Report](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Search for Page or Report icon") icon, enter **Payment Methods**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Search for Page or Report](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Search for Page or Report icon") icon, enter **Payment Methods**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Zvolte ikonu ![Vyhledat stránku, nebo sestavu](media/ui-search/search_small.png "ikona vyhledat stránku, nebo sestavu"), zadejte **Způsoby platby** a pak vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Fill in the fields as necessary.

seg-source.mrk: Fill in the fields as necessary.
